title: Innovative Virginia county has discovered a way for data centers to fund housing
description: Leaders in Henrico County have discovered an innovative way to lower the cost of homes for first-time buyers.
content:
Behind the generative AI boom is a rush to build the data centers and server farms that power themsnapping up land, straining power and water systems, and fueling bitter local fights.
But in Henrico… [+9608 chars]
